prompt: I got $20 worth of Taco Bell. I haven't ate all day.
i was so mad.  I came home and my back door was left open.
I hide my snacks from my kids so I dont have to share.
I was in a car wreck on the way home from church.
I am incredibly lucky to have a stranger return my new phone when I lost it on the bus.

I totally thought that my friend was so bad with girls that he would never find a girlfriend. Despite that_comma_ today he came to me and told me that he is going on a date with a girl that he thinks is super into him!
My husband had to go out of town for work this week. It's just me and the kids here.
A supervisor I didn't like got fired.  I have a new one coming soon to replace him
Last Halloween_comma_ I went to a haunted house. It was the scariest one I have ever been to. It was very realistic.
